game.name: ゆるキャン△ みんなでワチャワチャ！キャンピングクック！
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Team up with the Laid-back Camp crew for camping & cooking fun! A wacky 1–4 player action game where you set up tents, cook meals, and cooperate to complete camping tasks. Enjoy both solo challenges and fun multiplayer chaos in the great outdoors!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Team up with the Laid-back Camp crew for camping & cooking fun! A wacky 1–4 player action game where you set up tents, cook meals, and cooperate to complete camping tasks. Enjoy both solo challenges and fun multiplayer chaos in the great outdoors!
